# tf.all_variables

``` python
tf.all_variables()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py).

See the guide: [Variables > Exporting and Importing Meta Graphs](../../../api_guides/python/state_ops#Exporting_and_Importing_Meta_Graphs)

See `tf.global_variables`. (deprecated)

THIS FUNCTION IS DEPRECATED. It will be removed after 2017-03-02.
Instructions for updating:
Please use tf.global_variables instead.
